item.description:
This is a great chance to unwind after work and enjoy the beauty of the Charles River, the excitement of Harvard Square and to explore some of the quieter beautiful residential neighborhoods of Cambridge.

We will meet in front of Au Bon Pain in Harvard Square. The parking meters are free after 6:00. It is also right next to the Red Line station. Upon request, I can also drive some people from Brookline to Cambridge. The walk should last about 2 hours and will be a lot of fun.
item.name: Evening Walk along the Charles River and Harvard Square
